titleStmt.title: Tvvelve rules, and vveapons concerning the spirituall battel Together with a briefe exposition vpon the sixteene Psalme: with two most worthie epistles, written in Latin by that most worthy and noble gentleman Iohn Picus Earle of Mirandula. And translated into English for the benefite of all good Christian souldiers in the spirituall battaile.
Selections
titleStmt.author: Pico della Mirandola, Giovanni, 1463-1494.
W. H., fl. 1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Windet, for Iohn Daldern, and are to be sold in Canon lane at the signe of the vvhite horse,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 19898+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Canon lane at the signe of the vvhite horse
